oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Citrinin as a possible cause of the pruritis, pyrexia, haemorrhagic syndrome in cattle
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Griffiths, I. B.
Done, S. H.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: haemorrhagic syndrome
pruritis
pyrexia
Citrinin
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An outbreak of the pruritis, pyrexia, haemorrhagic syndrome affected eight of a herd of 175 cows which was divided into two groups of 115 and 60 according to yield. Full article published in Veterinary Record(1991) 129, 113-117
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1991; 28
